section.title: Downloading XCSoar
section.p:
The software is available as a free download from the XCSoar website
http://xcsoar.sourceforge.net.

Several files are available, broadly these include:
Program
Data Files Individual airspace
Terrain / Topology
Download the relevant package for your Pocket PC operating system version and save it to disk:
Additional files Additional data files, such as terrain and topology, special use airspace, waypoints etc can be downloaded at this stage, or after installation of XCSoar. The files used by XCSoar are described in
data-files.

ul.li: Linux - Installation from a linux work station
Mac OS X - Installation from Mac OS X
Flash Card - Installation via Flash card (Compact Flash, Secure Digital etc)
